claim_text: Holder (2) for the releasable fastening of a flat approximately rectangular device such as a tablet - computer or a smartphone on a component, in particular on a component of a motor vehicle, with a mounting element. dependent_claims.claim_text: Holder (2) according to claim 1, characterized by the, that the coupling element (24) an attachment section. (28) for the arrangement of the additional element thereon.

(12) , wherein the insertion section (10) is designed in such a way that this also the coupling element (24) in captive manner on the carrier element (8) holds.
